subject: Giro d'Italia (Bicycle Race)
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Matthew Goss of Australia won the third stage of the Giro d’Italia on Monday, while Mark Cavendish of Britain and the American Taylor Phinney were involved in a crash in the sprint finish.
snippet: Matthew Goss of Australia won the third stage of the Giro d’Italia on Monday, while Mark Cavendish of Britain and the American Taylor Phinney were involved in a crash in the sprint finish.
